page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN BOURNEMOUTH
page.content: IN BOURNEMOUTH THERE ARE JOBS WHICH OTHER TOWNS DO NOT HAVE BECAUSE OF THE BEACH, FOR EXAMPLE, THERE ARE JOBS LIKE WORKING IN KIOSKS ON THE PROM. BOURNEMOUTH IS A SEASIDE TOWN SO A LOT OF MONEY IS MADE BY PEOPLE WHO OWN HOTELS OR DO BED AND BREAKFAST. THERE ARE QUITE A LOT OF TOURIST SHOPS. THERE ARE NOT MANY FACTORIES IN BOURNEMOUTH SO THERE ARE FEW JOBS IN THAT AREA, ALTHOUGH THERE IS AN ICE-CREAM FACTORY. THERE ARE A LOT OF CAFES SO WAITRESSING JOBS ARE COMMON AND THERE ARE QUITE A FEW SATURDAY JOBS FOR YOUNG PEOPLE LIKE WASHING UP IN HOTELS. IN BOURNEMOUTH THERE ARE MANY OFFICES BUT MANY PEOPLE HAVE JOBS LIKE BEING A DOCTOR, MILKMAN, POSTMAN OR NURSE. HURN AIRPORT IS NEAR AND IT PROVIDES LOTS OF JOBS FOR PEOPLE.
